Class Settings

java.lang.Object
cs230.external.Settings
public class Settings extends Object
Handles user settings

      LineUnavailableException - the line unavailable exception

      Throws:

      IOException - the io exception
      UnsupportedAudioFileException - the unsupported audio file exception
